verses.verse: So Israel <WH3478> set <WH5265> out with all <WH3605> that he had, and came <WH935> to Beersheba, <WH884> and offered <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> to the God <WH430> of his father Isaac. <WH1>
And God <WH430> spoke <WH559> to Israel <WH3478> in visions <WH4759> of the night <WH3915> and said, <WH559> "Jacob, <WH3290> Jacob. <WH3290>" And he said, <WH559> "Here <WH2009> I am."

And He said, <WH559> "I am God, <WH410> the God <WH430> of your father; do not be afraid <WH1> to go <WH3372> down <WH3381> to Egypt, <WH3381> for I will make <WH4714> you a great <WH7760> nation <WH1419> there. <WH1471>

"I will go <WH3381> down <WH3381> with you to Egypt, <WH4714> and I will also <WH1571> surely <WH5927> bring <WH5927> you up again; <WH3254> and Joseph <WH3130> will close <WH7896> <WH3027> your eyes. <WH5869>"

Then Jacob <WH3290> arose <WH6965> from Beersheba; <WH884> and the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> carried <WH5375> their father Jacob <WH1> and their little <WH3290> ones <WH2945> and their wives, <WH2945> in the wagons <WH802> which <WH5699> Pharaoh <WH834> had sent <WH6547> to carry <WH7971> him.

And they took <WH3947> their livestock <WH4735> and their property, <WH7399> which <WH834> they had acquired <WH7408> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and came <WH935> to Egypt, <WH4714> Jacob <WH3290> and all <WH3605> his descendants <WH2233> with him:

his sons <WH1121> and his grandsons <WH1121> with him, his daughters <WH1323> and his granddaughters, <WH1323> <WH1121> and all <WH3605> his descendants <WH2233> he brought <WH935> with him to Egypt. <WH4714>
Now these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> Jacob <WH3290> and his sons, <WH1121> who went <WH935> to Egypt: <WH4714> Reuben, <WH7205> Jacob's first-born.
And the sons <WH1121> of Reuben: <WH7205> Hanoch <WH2585> and Pallu <WH6396> and Hezron <WH2696> and Carmi. <WH3756>
And the sons <WH1121> of Simeon: <WH8095> Jemuel <WH3223> and Jamin <WH3226> and Ohad <WH161> and Jachin <WH3199> and Zohar <WH6714> and Shaul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of a Canaanite <WH3669> woman.
And the sons <WH1121> of Levi: <WH3878> Gershon, <WH1648> Kohath, <WH6955> and Merari. <WH4847>

And the sons <WH1121> of Judah: <WH3063> Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209> and Shelah <WH7956> and Perez <WH6557> and Zerah <WH2226> (but Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209> died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>). And the sons <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> were Hezron <WH2696> and Hamul. <WH2538>
And the sons <WH1121> of Issachar: <WH3485> Tola <WH8439> and Puvvah <WH6312> and Iob <WH3102> and Shimron. <WH9616>
And the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun: <WH2074> Sered <WH5624> and Elon <WH356> and Jahleel. <WH3177>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Leah, <WH3812> whom <WH834> she bore <WH3205> to Jacob <WH3290> in Paddan-aram, with his daughter <WH1323> Dinah; <WH1783> all <WH3605> his sons <WH1121> and his daughters <WH1323> [numbered] thirty-three.
And the sons <WH1121> of Gad: <WH1410> Ziphion <WH6837> and Haggi, <WH2291> Shuni <WH7764> and Ezbon, <WH675> Eri <WH6179> and Arodi <WH722> and Areli. <WH692>

And the sons <WH1121> of Asher: <WH836> Imnah <WH3232> and Ishvah <WH3438> and Ishvi <WH3440> and Beriah <WH1283> and their sister <WH269> Serah. <WH8294> And the sons <WH1121> of Beriah: <WH1283> Heber <WH2268> and Malchiel. <WH4439>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah, <WH2153> whom <WH834> Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> to his daughter <WH1323> Leah; <WH3812> and she bore <WH3205> to Jacob <WH3290> these <WH428> sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> persons. <WH5315>
The sons <WH1121> of Jacob's wife <WH802> Rachel: <WH7354> Joseph <WH3130> and Benjamin. <WH1144>

Now to Joseph <WH3130> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> were born <WH3205> Manasseh <WH4519> and Ephraim, <WH669> whom <WH834> Asenath, <WH621> the daughter <WH1323> of Potiphera, <WH6319> priest <WH3548> of On, <WH204> bore <WH3205> to him.

And the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin: <WH1144> Bela <WH1106> and Becher <WH1071> and Ashbel, <WH788> Gera <WH1617> and Naaman, <WH5283> Ehi <WH278> and Rosh, <WH9537> Muppim <WH4649> and Huppim <WH2650> and Ard. <WH714>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Rachel, <WH7354> who <WH834> were born <WH3205> to Jacob; <WH3290> [there were] fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> persons <WH5315> in all. <WH3605>
And the sons <WH1121> of Dan: <WH1835> Hushim. <WH9127>
And the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali: <WH5321> Jahzeel <WH3183> and Guni <WH1476> and Jezer <WH3337> and Shillem. <WH8006>

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah, <WH1090> whom <WH834> Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> to his daughter <WH1323> Rachel, <WH7354> and she bore <WH3205> these <WH428> to Jacob; <WH3290> [there were] seven <WH7651> persons <WH5315> in all. <WH3605>

All <WH3605> the persons <WH5315> belonging to Jacob, <WH3290> who came <WH935> to Egypt, <WH4714> his direct <WH3409> descendants, <WH3318> not including <WH905> the wives <WH802> of Jacob's sons, <WH1121> [were] sixty-six persons <WH5315> in all, <WH3605>

and the sons <WH1121> of Joseph, <WH3130> who <WH834> were born <WH3205> to him in Egypt <WH4714> were two; <WH8147> all <WH3605> the persons <WH5315> of the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> who came <WH935> to Egypt, <WH4714> [were] seventy. <WH7657>

Now he sent <WH7971> Judah <WH3063> before <WH6440> him to Joseph, <WH3130> to point <WH3384> out [the way] before <WH6440> him to Goshen; <WH1657> and they came <WH935> into the land <WH776> of Goshen. <WH1657>

And Joseph <WH3130> prepared <WH631> his chariot <WH4818> and went <WH5927> up to Goshen <WH1657> to meet <WH7122> his father Israel; <WH1> as soon as he appeared <WH3478> before <WH7200> him, he fell <WH413> on his neck <WH5307> and wept <WH6677> on his neck <WH1058> a long <WH6677> time. <WH5750>
Then Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> "Now <WH6471> let me die, <WH4191> since <WH310> I have seen <WH7200> your face, <WH6440> that you are still <WH5750> alive. <WH2416>"

And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his brothers <WH251> and to his father's household, <WH1004> "I will go <WH5927> up and tell <WH5046> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and will say <WH559> to him, 'My brothers <WH251> and my father's household, <WH1004> who <WH834> [were] in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> have come <WH935> to me;

and the men <WH376> are shepherds, <WH7462> for they have been <WH1961> keepers <WH376> of livestock; <WH4735> and they have brought <WH935> their flocks <WH6629> and their herds <WH1241> and all <WH3605> that they have.'
"And it shall come <WH1961> about when <WH3588> Pharaoh <WH6547> calls <WH7121> you and says, <WH559> 'What <WH4100> is your occupation <WH4639>?'

that you shall say, <WH559> 'Your servants <WH5650> have been <WH1961> keepers <WH376> of livestock <WH4735> from our youth <WH5271> even until <WH5704> now, <WH6258> both <WH1571> we and our fathers,' that you may live <WH1> in the land <WH3427> of Goshen; <WH776> for every <WH1657> shepherd <WH3605> is loathsome <WH7462> to the Egyptians. <WH8441> "
